vpsissldcAdvConfig Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » LDC Config API

Advanced configuration Parameters for LDC. More...

#include <vps_cfgldc.h>

Detailed Description

Advanced configuration Parameters for LDC.

struct vpsissldcAdvConfig_t

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::circBuffSize

Circular buffer size if circular buffering mode is used. Specified in terms of number of rows. must be even Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to 0

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::enableCircAddrMode

Flag to enable Circular addressing mode for input data 1: Enables circular addressing mode, need to specify mod parameter 0: Disables circular addressing mode Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to FALSE

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::enableConstOutAddr

Flag to enable Constant output address mode Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to TRUE

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputBlockHeight

Output block Height must be even and greater than 0

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputBlockWidth

Output block width must be multiple of 8 in 422 mode multiple of 16 in 420 mode multiple of 8 in 12bit unpacked mode multiple of 32 in 12bit packed mode multiple of 16 in 8bit packed or ALAW input depending on the format, must be greater than 8/16/32

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputFrameHeight

Output Frame Height, must be multiple of outBlockHeight Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to input height

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputFrameWidth

Output Frame Width, must be multiple of outBlockWidth Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to input width

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputStartX

Output starting X-coordiinate (must be even) Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to 0

uint32_t vpsissldcAdvConfig::outputStartY

Output starting Y-coordinate (must be even) Supported in HAL. Unsupported in driver - will be forced to 0
